about_the_game:
RESOURCES

  • Three sinister floors to explore within the dungeon, with diverse enemies, traps, puzzles and secrets.
  • Choices allow for multiple story branches where you determine your own destiny.
  • Charismatic and fun NPCs that will help (or hinder) you throughout the game.
  • Lots of items, artifacts, weapons and curses for you to loot and enjoy throughout your adventure.
  • Procedural map generation. Each time you enter the dungeon, it will be different.
  • Battles against several eccentric and extremely challenging bosses.
  • Get ready to plunge into the depths of insanity.

HISTORY

You, a legendary warrior who died decades ago, have been resurrected through a black magic ritual. Your objective now is to enter the Dungeon of Insanity and rescue the princess. But for that you'll have to go through several challenges, face terrible enemies and, in the end, face the most bastard of all villains: the necromancer.


Choose your champion, hone your skills in the Lionstone kingdom camp, find treasure, gather the most powerful ancient relics and be prepared to face insane enemies, ranging from skeletons and bats, to big swords that spit small swords! Stay tuned, because at the end of each floor of the dungeon there is a massive and menacing master waiting for you for a supreme challenge!

CONSEQUENCES

Along your journey, you will be faced with several choices.
  • Which artifact to get?
  • Use a cursed weapon?
  • Free a crazy prisoner?
  • Betray the king's trust?
  • Save the life of a ham villager?

From small to big choices, all your decisions have consequences that will reverberate throughout the journey. Think carefully about what you're going to do, because although you can return to the dungeon as many times as you want, even after being killed several times, the choices made during the journey are permanent. After all, it's not possible to go back in time... right?

COMMUNITY


If you like what you've seen so far, consider joining our Discord server to stay up to date on development, meet the developers, and get early access to news, screenshots, videos, and demos!
detailed_description:
WishList Now


Please help us reach more players. Simply placing this item on your wishlist is an incredible amount of support from you. And click "Follow" to receive updates on development.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: Dungeon of Insanity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 320, 1GB or AMD Radeon HD 6570, 1GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Dungeon of Insanity is an action-adventure roguelike that puts the hero inside a dungeon full of enemies, traps, gold, and crazy characters. Face the undead, find treasures, save the princess, beat up the necromancer.
